reporter_caption.center: TAIT v. NORTH AMERICAN EQUITABLE LIFE ASSURANCE CO., 176 Ohio St. 240 (1964)

caption.center: TAIT, APPELLANT v. NORTH AMERICAN EQUITABLE LIFE ASSURANCE CO., APPELLEE.

opinion.posture: APPEAL from the Court of Appeals for Hamilton County.
opinion.opinion_text:
The appeal as of right herein is dismissed for the reason that no substantial constitutional question is involved.
ZIMMERMAN, MATTHIAS, O'NEILL, GRIFFITH, HERBERT and GIBSON, JJ., concur.Page 241
